target_markets.market_description: Entrepreneurs and business owners looking to monetize communities
target_markets.market_size_indicators: Average paid community makes $1,360 per month

problems_validated.problem: Entrepreneurs struggling with low income and need for sustainable revenue streams
problems_validated.severity: High - directly references bank account struggles
problems_validated.market_gap: Need for community-based recurring revenue model

products_tools.name: Skool
products_tools.metrics: Average paid community makes $1,360/month, top earners make $62,000/month (Bill) and $41,000/month (Jamie)

business_strategies.implementation: Start free community, build engagement, convert to paid model
business_strategies.case_study: Bill making $62,000/month helping with bookkeeping, Jamie making $41,000/month helping women invest

problems_solutions.problem: Low income from traditional business models
problems_solutions.solution: Create monetized communities on Skool platform
steps: Scale to top 10 for additional benefits

startup_ideas.target_market: People seeking specialized knowledge (bookkeeping, investing, etc.)
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Access to expert guidance and community support
startup_ideas.validation: Examples of successful communities already making $40k-60k/month

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Gaming the engagement system for points
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Focus on genuine engagement rather than point collection
mistakes_to_avoid.example: User reported being banned for excessive liking/commenting for points

growth_tactics.tactic: Build engaged community first, then monetize

metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: Focus on engagement and value delivery to reach top 10

trends_signals.opportunity: One out of two businesses on Skool create money online

actionable_quotes.quote: One out of two businesses on school create money online
actionable_quotes.context: Success rate of monetization on the platform
actionable_quotes.actionability: High probability of success when starting a Skool community

actionable_quotes.actionability: Sets realistic income expectations for new community creators

comment_insights.author: @@BigBoyBlue

comment_insights.insight: Target audience struggles with low bank account balances

comment_insights.author: @@EmperorHero1

comment_insights.insight: Platform has engagement gaming issues leading to bans
comment_insights.evidence: Many school communities are scamming us because of their Level up leaderboard and if we like and comment more to collect more points for Level up then our account is banned from skool
comment_insights.author: @@ai__teachers
comment_insights.relevance: Reveals potential platform issues that could affect user experience
